p: Patent application WO2005097165 claims a method for treating SARS viral infection using IL-28A, IL-28B, and IL-29 cysteine variants conjugated to polymers (e.g., polyethylene glycol) and discloses the amino acid and nucleic acid sequences for these cysteine variants. Of these variants, MetIL-29C172S-PEG (RN 867228-40-8) was specifically shown to inhibit viral replication.
